description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of hotel rooms, including UI components like AppBar, ListView, and handling of different loading/error states. It interacts with services for authentication and room data fetching.

classes.name: RoomsListPage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the page that displays a list of available hotel rooms.

classes.name: _RoomsListPageState
classes.description: The state class managing the data and UI for RoomsListPage, including fetching room data and handling UI states.

classes.name: _ErrorView
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying an error message with a retry option.

classes.name: _EmptyView
classes.description: A stateless widget indicating no available rooms and providing a refresh button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the RoomsListPage, including the AppBar, body with FutureBuilder, and list of rooms.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the component, initiating the first fetch of room data.

methods.name: _ErrorView
methods.description: Build method of the _ErrorView widget, displaying error info and retry button.

methods.name: _EmptyView
methods.description: Build method of the _EmptyView widget, displaying no rooms message and refresh button.
